claim: Lion was written by Garth Davis.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Pawar made his film debut with a role as a younger Saroo Brierley in Garth Davis 's Lion a 2016 Australian biographical film directed by Garth Davis and written by Luke Davies with Dev Patel , Rooney Mara , David Wenham , and Nicole Kidman .

claim: Lion was written by Garth Davis.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Lion is a 2016 biographical film directed by Garth Davis  (  in his feature debut  )  and written by Luke Davies , based on the non-fiction book A Long Way Home by Saroo Brierley with Larry Buttrose .
